segments.text: I notice the angled view of this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is on, basin full to overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor in a steady flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the two-step stool, hand in cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands below, arm up towards the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open, showing the labeled cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink frames a calm garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and fence visible outside, neatly arranged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widens under the woman's unaware foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR
